story.storybody:
*

Rays Power Infra today announced the completion of a 10 MW solar PV for one of its client Haldirams in Telangana. The project was commissioned seven months before schedule, the company said in a statement. The project was executed by Rays Power Infra on a turnkey basis, right from land acquisition till commissioning.

It also marks the entry of Haldirams into the power sector with the successful performance ratio of not less than 79 per cent.

****** Monsanto to establish over 2500 sanitation units *

Monsanto has partnered with an NGO for establishment of over 2,500 sanitation units across rural India.

Poor sanitation conditions continue to remain a critical challenge in India, particularly in the rural areas posing a grave danger to the security and dignity of women, the company said in a statement today.

"Monsanto has partnered with NGO Action for Food Production (AFPRO) for installation of over 2,500 sanitation units across rural India," it added.

As a part of this initiative Monsanto has a target of building more than 600 household toilets and 15 school sanitation units in government schools, it said.

****** Bigbasket forays into Jaipur market *

Bigbasket, an online supermarket, today announced its foray into the market of Jaipur.

"As per our expansion plan, we are offering our services to Jaipur which is the 24th city where our services are available," Bigbasket Head of National Expansion, Pallavi Palkar said.

"We provide convenient, one-stop online shopping for products at competitive prices delivered to doorsteps," she added. PTI JTR SID SDA SBT MR
story.shortheadline: Rays Power announces completion of solar project in Telangana
